version_description:
1.优化远程桌面，优化键盘
2.优化注册流程，支持手机注册
3.性能优化及部分bug修复

1、全新鼠标模式，“会飞的鼠标”增加鼠标左右键，解决滚屏难等问题；
2、专业与商业级用户将看到新增CMD功能；
3、支持局域网发现，局域网内远程桌面秒开；
4、全面适配ios9.0
5、修复部份BUG

Support wakeup stick config
New virtual mouse
Customizable keyboard
Fingerprint login
Download files to local

[Added] Support our brand new hardware named "KK", access your computer which has no network
[Added] Beginner's guide，turn Newbies instantly to Masters
[Added] Provide Special Offers, offer everyday
[Added] Pointer mode，precised pointing with one finger
[Other] Minor optimizations

[Added] Support Swiftpoint GT mouse, let remote control cool to fly.
[Other]Fix some bugs.

[New] "Recently" access module to help you escape the trouble to find the host.
[Optimization] Part of the bug optimization, welcome to update experience.
[Surprise] My welfare from time to time on new, often come ah.

-Fit for iPhone X and iOS 11 .

An all-new remote controlling experience for game players.
